plot: A compilation of horror- and monster-themed amateur productions made during childhood or their teen years by Bob Burns, Frank Dietz, Robert Tinnell and others, including a number of future non-professionals.
title: Monster Kid Home Movies
plot_es: A compilation of horror- and monster-themed amateur productions made during childhood or their teen years by Bob Burns, Frank Dietz, Robert Tinnell and others, including a number of future non-professionals.
